Hi all,

i have the problem shown in the subject. My class has to be told some
argumets before it can work. For the curious,it's the main args that
have to be submitted to the ORB initialization.
I worked around it by having a main method, and a static String[] in
MyTestCase. But the problem is that this way is bad for 2 reasons:
. MyTestCase cannot be agregated in a bigger TestSuite, unless I provide
some args passing method in what runs the tests, and that leads me to
the second point:
. I cannot use the swingui TestRunner as it takes a class, and doesn't
run it's main, and I think junit doesn't have anything to make my test
class get the command line args.
Inheritance can be the key if all my test cases inherited from, say
CorbaTestCase, that provides a static method setArgs(). But the problem
of using something like the graphical interface annihilates (FIXME) my
workaround.
I can technically change the junit code to do waht I want, but the
problem is that I'm working in a proprietary software (I did all I could
to et it open sourced...), I think that legally all my changes to the
junit soft has to be published in GPL.

Regards,
Reda
